# Country list

```{r include = FALSE}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, here, kableExtra)
partners <- read.csv(here('Data', 'Main data frames', 'partners_names.csv')) |> as_tibble()
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
partners |> 
  rename(
    País = partner,
    `Código ISO` = partner_iso,
    Subregión = subregions
  ) |> 
  select(1:2) |> 
  kable(booktabs = TRUE, 
        align = 'lcl',
        linesep = '')
```
